TopicTitle: Any mod that adds a new star system

Articles.Content: Are there any mods that add new solar systems that are far from Kerbol and as such may be targets for "interstellar" missions?

Star Systems. Just be aware, it's very early on in the development, and the stars don't have planets around them, though I believe that some folks may have introduced planets; don't quote me on that, I don't even use the mod
